title: Freedom
description: What dark secret did the Founding Fathers of America hide, and who will stop at nothing to uncover it?Navy SEALs in-training, Dane Maddock and Bones Bonebrake can’t be in the same room without trying to kill each other, but soon find themselves caught up in a race with a secret society to solve a mystery that dates back to the founding of America. Find out how it all began in the action-packed first Dane and Bones Origins novella… Freedom!
author: David  Wood
